history.text: On August 21, 2012, the Tribal Council adopted Resolution No. 049-12, which repealed the existing Chapter GOV.03 and adopted a new version of Chapter GOV.03 that included whole-scale changes clarifying and updating the election process, as well as added new sections on vote recounts, tied votes, run-off elections, the Election Board hearing process and Tribal Court authority to hear appeals. The BIA, Great Lakes Agency, approved these amendments on September 5, 2012. As part of this approval, ministerial corrections were made to correct a citation under Section GOV.03.16(b)(3) and to correct typos in Sections Section GOV.03.06(b) and Section GOV.03.09(h).
